website_summaries.verdict: Despite some quirks with the previous version, the newest model is an improvement.
pros: This feeder doesn't have a smartphone app, but it's still capable
It can be set to dispense between 1 to 10 24-milliliter portions per day along with 4 daily alarm options
Runs on batteries or can be plugged in
You can record a personal meal call for your pets
cons: Some users report that the feeder doesn't have a long lifespan

website_summaries.verdict: This feeder's locking magnetic lid keeps kibble secure from scheming cats, and its bowl is next to impossible for curious kittens to paw off the base.
pros: Feeder dispenses one to ten 24ml portions per meal
Record your own special meal call, at least 10 seconds long
Supports up to 4 food distribution alarms each day
LCD clock and display make it easy to set
Stays shut with  magnetic locking lid
cons: and you must re-program after power outages
Timer may become less reliable over time

customer_reviews.title: Functional but needs a stainless steel bowl
customer_reviews.text: This machine works well now that it's been redesigned to use a flexible dispensing mechanism to prevent jamming. Just wish it came with a stainless steel dish but a trip to the pet store solved that. A 6.25" x 1" bowl from Durabolz Selecta fits perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: StrayCat

customer_reviews.title: Stops working after 9 months.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this in February 2018 and it worked very well until last month. For some reason, the machine resets itself and won’t feed the cats at the time programmed. I have to reprogram it every few hours. The screen is supposed to show all four feedings are programmed but I’ll go back and see none of them. I didn’t even know it has stopped until my cat was sitting in front of it crying for food. I’m using electrical power so I know It’s not a battery issue. I’m trying to reach the company but I don’t see an easy way to reach them. Hoping it has a one year warranty
customer_reviews.author: Kristen F

customer_reviews.title: Love....but tweaked a bit
customer_reviews.text: ONLY downfall is the trays are not slanted to allow food to fall away from under the place it drops from. Easy fix though.... They come off easily to wash. I just rested them on the edge and raised the unit with a thin piece of wood (could use anything around the house i.e. book, etc). Worked effortlessly and took me about 30 seconds. Food now runs lightly to the edge instead of staying up against the unit.
customer_reviews.author: K WTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT RELIABLY DISPENSE FOOD
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money. I'm gone for most of the day and have an active cat who requires frequent feeds throughout the day. I thought it was working fine until a friend noticed how skinny my cat looked. I happened to be home one evening and noticed that NO FOOD was dispensed when the feeder was timed to feed 3 portions of food (one kibble dropped out). This is an incredibly unreliable product and I regret that I cannot return it. I'm going to contact the company directly.
customer_reviews.author: CLouise

customer_reviews.title: My cat is bad, but the machine is good
customer_reviews.text: So my cat loves it. She comes running every time it dispenses BUT I couldn't figure out why it would sometimes not dispense during a scheduled time. I FIGURED IT OUT JUST NOW. Sometimes she'll be sniffing around the the spot where the food comes out because she thinks she's starving and needs to be RIGHT THERE when it comes out. THE SENSOR that is there to make sure the tray doesn't get full is SENSING her big ol' head and so it's not dispensing! I think this is more a fault with my cat than machine, but there you go.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: FABULOUS!! Works like a charm!!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this because of going on a 2 week vacation. We have 2 cats. They can hear the voice from the next room, and they go running! We have it set up for two meals and a snack. The food does not get caught in dispenser. It is sturdy and well-made. Highly recommend!! This with the fountain water bowl are perfect!!
customer_reviews.author: ED

customer_reviews.title: Good product, but a pain in the rear
customer_reviews.text: I purchased three for my cats. Works very well, however the programming is in military time. Also, you have to reprogram if unplug or lose power. I had to move from one side to the other in my kitchen and it was a pain. There should be a "save settings" button. My cats have rubbed against it a few times and moved the feeders and I had to reprogram as well - not good when you have three and trying to get them all on the same feeding time.
customer_reviews.author: Brijette

customer_reviews.title: :(  Unreliable machine
customer_reviews.text: I Really needed this product to work. I wanted to use it for out of town trips. Luckily I set it up before hand so my dogs could get used to it. Unfortunalty after about the 4th day I guess it got stuck and wouldnt work. So I cleaned it out and started again. Then I noticed that the serviing size was inconsistent. The most you can give to your pet at a time is 1 cup serving. 4times a day. But there were times that it only dipensed half a cup. I ended up getting someone to come in and take care of the pups.
customer_reviews.author: j.jett

customer_reviews.title: Good feeder
customer_reviews.text: We've been using this feeder for about a week now and so far I'm happy with it. We have two cats that tend to over eat if we use a self feeder so the hunt for an automatic feeder began. You can set up multiple times to dispense food and there are several settings for amount. There is a sheet with what number to use for serving size. A big plus for us on this is that you can plug it in and not have to use batteries. So far it feeds our cats twice a day and does the right amount. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolute necessity for cats who wake you to be fed!
customer_reviews.text: Thank you, Arf Pets for this great machine. Since the cat has learned (in about a week) that I am NOT the “hand that feeds” him...he waits patiently around me for his pre-established feeding times. I finally eliminated the voice command...not necessary, as the moment he hears the food falling into the bowl, he literally LEAPS off the sofa or coffee table to go eat. No more scratching my box springs at 4 a.m. to wake me to feed him! 6 a.m. feedings are done without my having to get out of bed if I don’t want to!
customer_reviews.author: LTT

customer_reviews.title: Returned this feeder because it did not reliably dispense the ...
customer_reviews.text: Returned this feeder because it did not reliably dispense the kibble. I use roundish shaped kibble all the same small size and shape, and they often would not drop down to the bottom correctly. I think the agitator was either not functioning or just ineffective. I replaced it with the PetSafe Healthy Pet Simply Feed Automatic Petfood Dispenser and it works reliably.
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: Reasonably priced feeder that doesn't have any silly features you don't need. Gets the job done, and well.
customer_reviews.text: This thing works great. It's small enough to be discrete in a corner, and doesn't have those useless bells and whistles that other automatic feeders had. It does military time so that takes getting used to, however once you nail that down and the setting of a few feeding times it works like a charm. One thing to note is that it will annoy you with beeping until you fill it back up, even if it's just low but still has some food in it. The LCD screen lights up as blue of you hit the set button a few times.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron R

customer_reviews.title: It works.... I guess.
customer_reviews.text: My cat has discovered that by knocking her head against the device, she can get several pieces of kibble to fall at a time, rendering it basically useless to me. Sure, it feeds her reliably during her scheduled feeding times, but I got this in an effort to ensure I could keep her on her diet program, even when I'm not home. Because she's able to get kibble to fall whenever she wants, she has effectively ruined her diet. I would switch kibble brands (since the kind I have is fairly small) to see if that makes a difference, but she has to be on a special brand, so unfortunately I can't do that.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Robbins

customer_reviews.title: Jammed after four months; unreliable
customer_reviews.text: I feel really disappointed. I purchased this in August 2017 to make sure my cat would be getting a healthy amount of food (and no more..). Four months in, it is acting up and jamming. I am worried to leave him for a weekend and come back to a starving cat. I paid $100 for something that did not last long, and I felt like i was shelling out for something reliable. Not sure what to do. I had even recommended this to a friend who then bought it!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Kroart

customer_reviews.title: It works!!
customer_reviews.text: I was worried by the reviews but I was in a tight spot with a long trip just a couple days away. We had no problem using this product during our trip. We used this as a way to keep our cat from getting too upset between visits from cat sitters since we feed her in smaller feedings throughout the day. My cat is A BEAST and a troublemaker, I was sure she'd topple it, but we had no incidents with her spilling or knocking over the feeder. The user interface might not be the best, but if you follow the instructions it's pretty easy to set up.
customer_reviews.author: Sybil

customer_reviews.title: "Raccooned" and still working
customer_reviews.text: Our cat lives outdoors with access to a garage and a warm bad. We bought this to feed her while we go away on vacation. We have a neighbor check-in during the week to make sure all is well. When our neighbor checked last time, she said this was laying down with cat food on the floor by it. Sometimes we get raccoon visitors and we suspect that is what happened. It still kept working and thankfully the lid lock kept everything inside! I really appreciate the choices of portion sizes and frequency of feeding options along with being able to record a message for our pet!
customer_reviews.author: SLP

customer_reviews.title: Thank you robot feeder, we can sleep in again
customer_reviews.text: This thing works great. Also my 5 year old thinks it's a robot so it's now named the robot cat feeder. So it's pretty cool having a robot feed your cats, instead of passive aggressively knocking things off my dresser until I wake up to feed them, the cats just glare at this thing until it feeds them. I highly recommend this product if you like your sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Timer only worked for 3.5 months! Not dispensing food properly now!
customer_reviews.text: Timer function failing after only 3.5 months! Very disappointed! Especially considering the price. Bought 2. One still works, but the other one is malfunctioning. They have been sitting side by side since July 2018 and had been working great. Only now one isn't working properly and isn't keeping time correctly so isn't dispensing food correctly. I would have been happy to give this product an excellent rating....until now.
customer_reviews.author: Vickie Unrue

customer_reviews.title: Solution for persistent kitties!
customer_reviews.text: Thanks for CHANGING OUR LIVES! Our (sweet but determined) cat is obsessed with feeding times and was waking us up earlier and earlier for his breakfast (like 4:00 am early). We tried ignoring him, feeding him dinner later, shutting the bedroom door (he would just scratch and cry), spray bottles, everything. Then we got this and everything is MUCH better. Not only does it feed him on a regular schedule so that we no longer are woken up, he also disassociates us with his food now altogether. Everyone is much happier. The feeder is attractive and solid - he has not found a way into it since we've gotten it.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Great feeder
customer_reviews.text: I've had other automatic feeders in the past. They required difficult assembly, had limited features, didn't hold a lot of food, and my Ocicat took it apart on the first day. He could also open the lid by holding the back of the hopper with his paw and pushing on the front with his nose. This one is so simple, easy to program, the cats can't open the lid, and the last feature that really sold me was when we had a power outage last night and when the power came back on several hours later, all the clocks in the house had to be reset, but the feeder still had the correct time!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Great costumer service
customer_reviews.text: Originally loved it, worked perfectly and reliably as my dog needs small frequent meals for gastric issues. Now just over 6 months after purchasing it's malfunctioning for no apparent reason. The display indicates all meals are being given despite no food actually being dispensed. Randomly it will spit out a meal but more often than not it won't. I'm really disappointed that now I'm just left with what is essentially a $90 tiny food bin that is useless to me. Update: The company promptly sent me a replacement free of charge which was unexpected but greatly appreciated. New feeder works great, awesome costumer service experience, very happy again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy something else!!
customer_reviews.text: If care about your pets health I would not buy this product. I went out of town for a long weekend. When got back my cat was starving. Apparently arf is aware of a software problem that causes the lcd screen to blink blue and stop feeding my cat. When i called to see if it was negligence on my end the rep said no, they were aware of the problem. There is no fixing the lcd, they just expect us to endanger our pets like it’s no big deal. I’ve been using amazon for a longtime and never leave reviews but this is a dangerous problem and people need to be aware.
customer_reviews.author: joshua

customer_reviews.title: Reliably Feeds the Kitty
customer_reviews.text: We use this for our cat, and it works great! We can also verify that the battery backup works! Unbeknownst to us, the electricity was off in the outlet we were using for probably 2 months. We found the electrical issue before the feeder stopped working! It is very reliable, although the clock does seem to speed up over time (i.e. after 6 months, it was 10 minutes early). Portion control is always spot on, and the lock keeps the unserved food perfectly safe from foraging! I could totally see this working for dogs as well.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Best Auto Feeder for Cats
customer_reviews.text: I've bought 4 of these feeders over the last 3 years and they are wonderful! I use them for my cats. Easy to program and hold up well. Do have to use a smaller kibble and make sure not to overfill the food container. Works best for cats or small dogs up to 20lbs. I have a very big cat. The 4th one I bought worked but had a problem with the rotary moving and dispensing the correct amount of food. Called, then sent an email detailing the problem with a video. They sent a replacement feeder in 2 days! I wasn't even expecting a package. No fuss, no muss! Great company and fabulous product! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Birdie

customer_reviews.title: Feeder stopped feeding my PET :(
customer_reviews.text: My cat is starving from this feeder erroring out, and never making any kind of audible noise or alert to let me know it keeps failing. Getting EE:EE on my feeder after every feed, which means that it stops feeding my cat FOREVER. I went probably 2 days without noticing the feeder wasn't actually functioning and I'm really upset that my poor kitty wasn't getting his food.. Poor thing was so hungry!!! :( I now have to check it after every single feed, and in the morning. I'd be happy to review this better, but there's something deeply wrong with this feeder.
customer_reviews.author: Ali vee

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Cat Feeder for a Busy Lifestyle
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this feeder. Between being gone at work, out in the wilderness or off on a weekend adventure, I know Cheryl (my cat) is fed. Plus it nearly fits a whole small bag of food. So I don't have to store food in our small apartment! I HIGHLY recommend this product for the busy cat owners. The only thing I found odd is the battery section seems way larger than what it actually takes. But it still operates as designed - so I don't really have any complaints!
customer_reviews.author: BEH

customer_reviews.title: Life changing!
customer_reviews.text: I love this feeder! It gives you one less thing to worry about everyday. I have two outdoor cats and I keep their feeder in an enclosure so that other critters won’t see it. I feed them three small meals each day and I only have to refill it about every 10 days. I keep mine plugged in but I have the batteries installed for backup in case we were to ever lose power. I’ve had this for about 7 months now and it still works great, even in the Florida heat outside. Very satisfied customer, highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I received my units today and they are extremely sturdy and stable. However, the Set buttons are not easy to depress. I spent a considerable amount of time with the button in each unit and had to change the time by the time I completed the programming. Otherwise, the locking feature on the food dispenser is great and recordings are easy. The girls and I are happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Circledrawer26

customer_reviews.title: Second time's a charm
customer_reviews.text: The first one I bought I had to return because I couldn't get the setting panel to operate correctly. The second one is working correctly. I had to build a little box around the unit to keep the cats from removing the dispensing tray all of the time. The cats and dogs have learned that if they head butt the dispenser enough, they will be rewarded with food. The head butting is really annoying and so I'm planning on building a cover for during the day and then taking it off for the night time feeding or when we are gone.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen

customer_reviews.title: I love the audio feature
customer_reviews.text: This feeder is great and has a good capacity (we get just over a week with 2 cats) I LOVE the audio record feature, I just recorded myself going “MEEEOOOOOOWWWWW” really loudly once and it plays two or three times at each feeding during the dispensing. It is HILARIOUS! The pitch raises slightly in the recording but now every time I hear it I just start laughing. It’s a great way to break up the day! If you have this indoors it might echo, but ours does perfect on the porch (I can hear it inside the room adjacent)
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Kaffenberger

customer_reviews.title: Cat can beat the feeder for extra food easily
customer_reviews.text: Feeder works great BUT my cat has learned if he hits it or puts his paw under it to lift it and drop it, the feeder will drop food easily. And since he has learned this many times I would find the feeder on its side unplugged and my cats didn't get food all day. 😞😖 I've had to put the feeder in a tight box, with bricks around it, stuff cardboard around the side and double-sided tape the thing on the Bottom to keep my cat from getting all that extra food which was making him every over weight.
customer_reviews.author: ladybarnettie

customer_reviews.title: Would only be more perfect if the food sizes could be portioned even smaller ...
customer_reviews.text: Would only be more perfect if the food sizes could be portioned even smaller for more flexibility with cats. Otherwise, this is exactly what we are looking for! Easy to use, works like a charm. The microphone adds a great personal touch. I love that the bowl isn't required to be used with the feeder (we switched it out for a slow feed bowl). Our cats have tried to reach up and get more food - occasionally a few extra pieces have fallen at best.
customer_reviews.author: Jacquelyn

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Our cat has enjoyed this feeder for the past couple months. Instead of meowing at us, she waits patiently for the feeder to dispense her food. The dispenser and the voice recording work fine. In order to reset the schedule or make adjustments, I do have to pull the battery (holding the set button doesn't work to reset the unit). The unit is sturdy and the food secure. So far so good, and we are pleased! Be sure to calculate the amount of food your pet needs. Each portion is 24ml, which is equal to .1 cup. So if your pet eats 1/3 cup, you need to schedule 3 portions at that feeding.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: WORKED INITIALLY BUT ....
customer_reviews.text: Had been using this for over two months now, and it had been working reliably until last week, when it stopped dispensing food. The first time it happened, we were away for four days ... and good thing the feeder stopped functioning on our return home!! Then, it happened again this week. We checked the feeder to see if there are any clogged cat food in it, and two rectangular pieces of plastic fell off .... I am guessing this is the problem. Will be contacting the seller to find a solution. .
customer_reviews.author: EAT PRAY TRAVEL

customer_reviews.title: Wait for a newer, improved feeder -  still bugs to work out
customer_reviews.text: Received this item too late to return as we were leaving on vacation soon. The timers work and go off the way they were programmed; however, the voice recording will not work nor will the manual feed buttons work and it's too late to return it before we leave on vacation Seems like a great concept but they have a little more bug fixing to do on this. Would highly recommend other than these two issues. In fairness to customer service, I have not contacted them as I have not had time to do so
customer_reviews.author: sinatrablue

customer_reviews.title: Great product overall, but the digital interface is not easy to use, and it can be toppled easily
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these for my cats and they work very well! It works quite well for my purposes, but My only gripe with this product is that it's somewhat frustrating to change the feeding settings. You have to long press the button before it allows you to change things, and then you have to press the up or down button multiple times when changing the feeding time or the portion size.
customer_reviews.author: Alok M.

customer_reviews.title: but so far it’s wonderful! A few days per week I have really ...
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only been using it for a few days, but so far it’s wonderful! A few days per week I have really long days and can’t always get away to feed my cat. This helps ease my mind and keep my kitty full! It was so simple to set up and I love that the dish is shallow to prevent whisker fatigue. It looks great and holds an entire 7 lbs bag of cat food. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Mackenzie M.

customer_reviews.title: This Has Saved Our Sleep
customer_reviews.text: We have those annoying (but adorable) cats that stand on your chest at 3am demanding food. We have left foot out for them before going to sleep but they won't go find it unless you get up with them. It's insanity. This has SAVED us. The voice recording feature is what attracts our cats to the bowl. The second they hear it, they run and we get to stay sleeping without being screamed at. I would buy this again and definitely recommend it to anyone having this same issue.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: No more 5am annoying behavior from our cat
customer_reviews.text: We have only had this for a few weeks, but so far it has been life changing. It only took a few days for my cat to figure out that the machine was going to feed him instead of us. No more 5am annoying behavior from our cat! Easy to program and very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Love this. Be sure to follow instructions.
customer_reviews.text: I just love this automatic feeder! It’s easy to set up and delivers the portions up to 4 times a day. It takes my guilt out of feeding my overweight cats because previously I’d always add more when they emptied their bowls. Be sure to follow the instructions because you’re only supposed to fill it up to the line inside, NOT all the way to the top. I also advise adding the batteries in case the power goes out so it’ll continue to dispense the food as you programmed it to.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Cohen

customer_reviews.title: Save Your Money - and maybe your pet
customer_reviews.text: We used this to keep kitty from waking us at 5 am, and twice while we were away. It lost its mind after 14 months. Thankfully we were not away when that happened. Based on the number of reviews that say the same thing, the seller certainly knows about it. You set the current time, and then tell it when to drop food. When it hit the drop-food time the current time would revert to the default, which was 12 am, without dropping food. This would happen every time, therefore no food. For the price on this, it should last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Suber

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I love the look and programability of this feeder. We had an issue with the original one we ordered, it kept beeping as if it needed to be filled even when it was full of food. I contacted customer service and they were prompt in replying and supplying us with a brand new feeder with the issue resolved. The quality of the product is only surpassed by the quality of their customer service.
customer_reviews.author: M R Berling

customer_reviews.title: Dont bother.
customer_reviews.text: Food easily gets stuck in the rubber paddles that distribute it to the bowl, I returned the product, and will not reorder, seems to be a design fault/issue.
customer_reviews.author: SerJay

customer_reviews.title: Yeah, that clock doesn't work.
customer_reviews.text: Works good enough - but the clock is WAY off. At first it'll dispense food when programmed, but eventually it'll be way off. After one week it was dispensing at 11:08 instead of 11:00. A couple weeks after that it was 11:12. Not a big deal because it still dispenses the same amount of time apart... just weird. So far so good though.
customer_reviews.author: Gagagaga

customer_reviews.title: Works great except for voice recording
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good product, which worked very well, other than the voice recording system, which worked not at all. That's not really a big problem since the sound of the food dropping into the tray is enough to call my cat to it, but it is touted as one of the selling points. My only other issue is that there's an on/off switch on the underside of the feeder which the instructions don't mention. We had a frustrating few moments trying to figure out if the power cord was defective or if it was the machine itself. Then we turned it over to put in batteries and voila! there was a switch.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Parker

customer_reviews.title: The portion control is the best out there.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for our cat before we went on a trip out of town. That way we wouldn't have to bother someone to come take care of him while we were away. The features on this thing are amazing and the portion control impressed the heck out of me. Very easy to set and forget. It did take a couple of weeks of trial and error to get the correct portion for my cat, but if you already measure you food, then it will be a breeze from day one.
customer_reviews.author: T-RAV9

customer_reviews.title: Great pet feeder
customer_reviews.text: This is a great feeder. Had it for almost 2 years, and it's truly 'set and forget'. Set the timer, put in cat food and don't think about it until the cat tells you it's empty. I've only had it get jammed once, and it was very easy to shake out the cat food jam. It has a great battery backup in case the power goes out.
customer_reviews.author: greg hawley

customer_reviews.title: Life Saver
customer_reviews.text: Especially if you’re gone for a overnight trip, this is truly a life saver! It’s just gives you peace of mind leaving your cat alone for a couple days! The chart to set portions is helpful, the lock is impossible for a hungry cat to open, and the bowl can detach which makes it easy to clean! Also SO easy to use/ set up!! You can set the time of feedings along with the portion along with a cute recorded message for your fur baby (my favorite part)!! It’s compartment is so large I fit an entire bag of cat food in it! Love love love this!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Works well - my little furbeast now only wakes me up for affection instead of food
customer_reviews.text: This has been extremely helpful in getting a full night's sleep rather than having it cut short with meows demanding food. I wish there was slightly more control over the portion control and times (i.e. 6 smaller feeding times rather than 3 medium ones or 1 large one), and had to play around with timing to find that my cat needed equal portions at each meal to reach minimal complaining, which could only be achieved with 3 meals per day.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST CAT FEEDER
customer_reviews.text: We have used automatic feeders in the past for our two cats, but when the last one pooped out, we decided to try a different brand. I love this one! I can set multiple feed times and multiple amounts at each feed time. Along with an indicator when it is empty, it has the capability to record a short message (In my case it was "Here kitty kitty") which plays just before the food drops! Sounds silly, but the cats hear it and come running! Lovin' this very much!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy P

customer_reviews.title: Good unit design, but not 100% reliable
customer_reviews.text: I had some issues with the feeder in the very beginning because of the kibble size. It would not dispense the same amount of food reliably. Once switching to smaller kibble it was much more reliable, however then the plastic propellers broke and ended up in the food. After 3 months (purchased on June 2), all 5 of the propellers are broken and I had to call the manufacturer to get a replacement. Customer service was great, they noted that these tend to break after a year however. Fortunately my dog eats slowly and hasn't ingested any of these, but definitely a concern. If this propeller were metal or some other material this product would be worthy of 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: David T.

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing. Easy to program and reliable. I never set up the audio but the whir of the motor is enough for my cat. Update: Tonight I became terrified because my cats finally managed to flip the thing over (took over two years and it seemed like a lucky hit for them) and they broke the bottom lip of the lid. I was devastated—I love this thing and was begrudgingly came here to buy a second. But I though to check out their website and sure enough they offer replacement parts super cheap! So $9 and a piece of tape for the short term and I’ll be back fully in business soon.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Evans

customer_reviews.title: We have been so thrilled we even believe that our cat is happier. Instead of slapping us awake at 4 AM
customer_reviews.text: This thing changed our life! We have been so thrilled we even believe that our cat is happier. Instead of slapping us awake at 4 AM, Or just running around the house screaming,Used to a schedule of three small meals a day and it has made all the difference for us. The product is great, the concept is great, And we actually have a happier home with a calmer kitty.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this feeder a few months ago after my demonic kitty destroyed his old feeder in search of food. So far, he's figured out where the food goes in and where it comes out, but he can't get in! I did have to tape it to a bookcase so he couldn't knock it hard enough to keep releasing single kernels of food all day. I was worried he might somehow find a way to start shaking it to release food like another cat I know. It seems fairly kitty-proof!
customer_reviews.author: Nickelz

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Getting used to the portion sizes is a bit tricky, I give this four stars because I don't think this has a sensor when the bowl is full. Overall I like the small portions and the battery backup. My cat grazes so sometimes she lets the bowl fill totally and I worry it will jam the machine. Whereas my mom's cat has the same feeder and eats everything it spits out immediately so it's great for her! It also has a much smaller hopper than most auto feeders but I prefer it small so I can clean it and make sure theres no bugs getting into her food.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Makes my life so much easier!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this on the fly when our sewer line collapsed and we couldn't live in our home. We weren't sleeping at home for 46 days. He stopped by the house at least every other day and it was such a relief to know that our two cats weren't going hungry. Plus, he recorded a hilarious version of himself calling them for food. I like the adjustable portion sizes. It's been easy to clean and the bowl is wide enough for both my cats to get their faces in there at the same time. The food stays in the bowl and doesn't spray out. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Felix

customer_reviews.title: ***DO NO RECOMMEND***
customer_reviews.text: ***DO NO RECOMMEND*** After going through 4 devices, only 1 has worked. Other devices had various issues such as would not dispense food, could not program, and/or power up. However, the one device that is working, is working great! Features I would like to see: 1: I would like to have a feature that would tell you no food dispensed so you can fill it. That could be an alarm, wifi app or something else. 2: Would like another option to have feeder synced to a collar with a special chip. This way food can only be dispensed if animals have special food and/or quantity.
customer_reviews.author: Random Guy at Office

customer_reviews.title: Brutally honest...exactly what every teenage pet owner needs
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has a fat cat and is always forgetting to feed him or feeds him too much. I was tired of always telling her to feed her cat as he would bother me. This feeder works perfectly. We have had it for about 4 months now and it feeds exactly on time and the right amount of portions we scheduled. She has even recorded a calling when it feeds so the cat can hear when it is time. I definitely recommend this to anyone with pets. We also used it while we were gone for a full week during Thanksgiving. It worked flawlessly
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Matney

customer_reviews.title: I don't know if our cat likes it better than us or if we like it better
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if our cat likes it better than us or if we like it better? Great product easy to use. The setting is a little different since you have to hold the set button down and then when it blinks you have to select it again before touching any other buttons. It took us a few to figure that out since instruction just say to hold down for 3-seconds to set and then use other keys to adjust and it doesn't mention you have to push it once more before doing the setting. Other than that Perrrrrfect.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Best automatic pet feeder!
customer_reviews.text: We have used two automatic feeders before and weren't terribly impressed each time. Our forever-hungry cat was able to get his dry food one piece at a time from the first one, while the second, though fairly cat-proof, was difficult to set the feeding time and quantity. This one meets all criteria--the cat can no longer "feed" himself and set-up was easy and straightforward. The machine even comes with a chart to show how to set military time. We're so happy to have found this feeder and even happier that we can now sleep past 5 am.
customer_reviews.author: HG

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected, but received used item
customer_reviews.text: It works as I hoped, but I received it smelling like petty food and covered in pet food dust. Ready to use and set up. I bought it for my cat, so he only easy a little serving 4 times a day. So when the food is suspended, it's stuck to the very back of the bowl instead of sliding forward. So he sometimes weary about eating.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Better choice
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 automatic feeders, this one and another by WOPET, this one is definitely better. The settings have both up and down arrow options which allow you to do all the settings much faster. Also they give you a chart that tells you exactly how much food will be dispensed at each level, the WOPET model did not do this and it was very time consuming to get it right.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen Seabolt

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Wish it had more god settings than 4 per day but I have used this product for a cat who eats her entire food bowl in one sitting and it works great to prevent her from overeating during the day and great if you need to go away for a weekend. Before this I had to set up two feeders that had 5 compartments for food in a turnstile. That was only good for 2 days at most and the first meal is gone the minute you put it out so you really only have 8 feedings using 2 devices. This product is much more convenient!
customer_reviews.author: Ellen K

customer_reviews.title: Food leaks out between servings
customer_reviews.text: I have two cats. I bought two of these feeders to control their daily food allowance. There is one big problem that has occurred: one cat has learned to bump against the feeder causing it to drop a number of food pellets into the feeding dish. By doing this repeatedly, she now has a continuous, unlimited food supply. She is not a heavy cat, weighing about nine pounds. I would like to keep her at this weight, but she appears to be gaining. There is a lot to like about these feeders but this problem of not properly closing off the food supply makes them much less useful and may prove to be a deal breaker.
customer_reviews.author: R. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Asked for a replacement to fix issue, still existing issue
customer_reviews.text: The worst part about this thing is that the buttons don't work sometimes. You have to unplug/replug it from the AC adapter to get the buttons to work again. I asked for a replacement and the issue still exists. When you do this it resets the clock every time, so you need to set it pretty much every time you want to make a change on the feeder. Because this is machine is automatic it has worked without any issues but I just hope it never malfunctions and my dog ends up starving a meal or something.
customer_reviews.author: Chris R.

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Works as described. Cat loves to hear the food fall and goes running each time. Still working out what measurements to use. Seems to drop more small kibble that it is set for, but it is a flat dish, so may just look like more. There is usually food left, which is good, since he use to eat like he would never be fed again. I am using it solely on battery, as there is no outlet where it needs to be (away from dogs). We will see how long they last at a time. It does hold quite a bit of food in the tank.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle C.

customer_reviews.title: Bug City
customer_reviews.text: Like many, we bought this product so our cat could have regular feedings while we were on vacation & the catsitter could only come by once or twice a day. After our last week away, we came back to find the feeder swarming with bugs. I'm not sure if they got through the bottom or the top, but there were bugs of various sizes swarming in and around the feeder. We had this feeder for almost exactly a year before this issue arose, so maybe the product deteriorated over time. Threw it away immediately and won't be trying an automatic feeder again - I'd rather deal with the cat waking me up in the morning than the roaches!
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly. Very happy with purchase. The first night I set this up in our screened porch, the racoons came and knocked it about and were able to unlock and eat all of the food inside. They were happy. Game on. The next night we set the feeder in a homemade racoon proof container made out of a trash can and bungee cords and the racoons are still trying to figure out how to get the morsels inside.
customer_reviews.author: tangolady

customer_reviews.title: Can't be tricked by a paw
customer_reviews.text: This is great. I have two fat tabby cats, I bought a similar feeder about a year ago (the one shaped kind of like and astronaut's helmet). I bought the feeder to help the cats lose weight, I am a sucker and would feed them whenever they meowed -- which was often. With the old feeder they figured out how to stick a paw into the dispenser to effectively eat whenever they wanted. They have been unsuccessful at breaking into this one so far. I also switched to a larger sized kibble -- Science Diet, to slow them down. So far they have both slimmed down considerably and no longer beg to be fed constantly.
customer_reviews.author: Liz O'

customer_reviews.title: Had it about a year now and it's helping my ...
customer_reviews.text: Wrote a 5 star review and I get home to a red blinking light on the feeder. Thinking it needs new batteries so I install some and still blinking and eventually goes dead. Worked great for 9 months. Had it about a year now and it's helping my cat lose weight since it doesn't give in to her whining.
customer_reviews.author: janet

customer_reviews.title: Works really well
customer_reviews.text: Works really well. It could be slightly improved if the dish was more slanted so that the food came to the front instead of collecting at the back of the dish - which makes it far too difficult for a finicky cat to get at it without a little encouragement. I think it would be really cool to put a seriously creepy message on the voice records so that when you have guests over it would be quite unexpected and freak the hell out of them. : )
customer_reviews.author: KG

customer_reviews.title: Pleases the Hungriest of Cats
customer_reviews.text: For anyone that has a cat they know how insistent the cat can be at feeding time, even if the cat feels like feeding time is 3:34 A.M. This programmable automatic feeder had saved my life. My cat is on a special eating plan and sometimes it was never racking to with about getting home for feeding time. The car recognized the sound of the machine within two feedings and now runs whenever it hears the sound. It is wonderful that you can record a message
customer_reviews.author: SarahOphelia

customer_reviews.title: Reliable high capacity cat feeder!
customer_reviews.text: We tried another multi feeder before we found this one and this Arf Auto Feeder is a life saver if you need to go away for a few days and feed your cat (or dog) with no one home. We left our cat for over 4 days with no problems, after first pre-testing the feeder and making sure we had it set up right. Getting the right volume of food to dispense took a little adjusting. We like that you can record your own voice to call your pet to come for dinner. Our cat is now knows it’s feeding time when she hears that voice call out, even now that we’re home!
customer_reviews.author: S Scott

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: This feeder is very well designed and simple to program. The battery option is nice since you don't have to place it near an outlet or, you can use the batteries as backup in the event of a power failure. If using it only with batteries, there is a light that comes on when they are getting low.
customer_reviews.author: GliderGuider

customer_reviews.title: Cat hates me less
customer_reviews.text: Omigosh, I thought I was an idiot for buying an automatic feeder for my cat. What else does he need me for? This has changed our relationship. No longer do I have to respond in kind to his yowling between the hours of 5 and 9 am ("Go the **** AWAY, CAT."). We can go on short trips without having to find someone to check in on him -- keeping the D batteries in it is worth the peace of mind. He's lost weight from the regular, evenly portioned meals. We love it. Robots clearly are better at loving our pets than we are.
customer_reviews.author: Iva

customer_reviews.title: Very dependable cat feeder
customer_reviews.text: Have been using the Arf Pets Feeder for 7 months now, and am very pleased with it. It is is plugged in with backup batteries installed. Have had no problems with feeding times or amount dispensed. Requires only quick cleaning periodically to remove buildup of food debris. Am finally able to spend short times away from home without bothering neighbors to feed the cat and no more worries about the cat going hungry. This, plus the automatic water dish has really been a plus for myself and my cat.
customer_reviews.author: garblefin

customer_reviews.title: we were very happy with this dispenser
customer_reviews.text: Initially, we were very happy with this dispenser, although the portions were not consistent. Then after about 8 months, it kept getting clogged, especially when the storage hopper was full. I found if I put only a few days' worth of food in, it would work okay, but that defeats the purpose of having an automatic feeder! Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Someone

customer_reviews.title: Bought two, both eventually malfunctioned
customer_reviews.text: I bought one and several months later the motor went out. Luckily it was still within the 1 year warranty so they replaced it with a newer model. Then several months later, just past the 1 year warranty, the second one started losing time even with both ac power and batteries installed. They said since I was past my 1 year I was out of luck but this is two for two so I am going to go with another brand this time.
customer_reviews.author: Clay H.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Our little dog loves this as much as us! We can get away for a couple of days without worry, he always gets fed right on time and hears us call him to "picnic time". Thoughtfully and well made. Only issue is food storage lid can be a bit challenging to open up. A better design would keep the needed dog related security of the food, while allowing a human to refill easier. A little pricey to some, but it is a quality unit and you do get what you pay for....good and bad.
customer_reviews.author: Skotty

customer_reviews.title: Quiet precise sturdy feeder
customer_reviews.text: Quiet, large bowl, sturdy. Cats can’t sneak kibble or pop kid open. Wish it held more but enough for a week with 3 cats! Great customer service. Careful when you unwrap the lid- don’t yank plastic wrap as you can damage locking mechanism. Did I mention great customer service😉👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: a little small for two growing kittens
customer_reviews.text: BTW it says you can dispense different size portions but it doesn't seem like four portions is still much more than two. BUT it does have four a day and that seems to be working for our hungry kittens. Only thing is you can't fill the canister to the top or it just won't turn to dispense food...but if you don't fill it up you have to fill it every couple of days. I was hoping for it go longer than that between needing to be filled. BUT it works well and has been a huge blessing.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Grose

customer_reviews.title: Better than our previous auto feeder
customer_reviews.text: This has a large hopper that stores weeks of food, a simple-enough digital timer to set feedings, and a relatively quiet dispensing mechanism that serves consistently sized portions. Our previous cat feeder wasn't digital, and used a turning cylinder to dispense the food. Adjusting it was very difficult, and portion sizes felt inconsistent. We also had to use a separate plug-in timer to set the feedings. This does not suffer from any of those problems, so it's a major upgrade. Properly cleaning the detachable food storage bin does take some time (hard-to-reach spaces require air drying), meaning you'll have to hand-feed or schedule your cleaning to avoid a hangry pet.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Runge

customer_reviews.title: I have 4 of these in my home. I ...
customer_reviews.text: I have 4 of these in my home. I even bought one for my BFF! They work, simply put. Ive been using them for weeks now and not a problem. I travel a lot and these have really helped allow me to leave my cats without worrying. Additionally, I use them when I am home. For my cats, I think I could go a week and a half of feeding. Each cat has its own feeder. If you wanted to really extend the feeding, you could buy two for each cat and alter feeding days.
customer_reviews.author: Danie'l

customer_reviews.title: Tough and works well as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: This one has out smarted my two 10 lb fur balls! They are two Mischievous kittens and this really works! A little hard for me to figure out how to program. And only other thing is my boys don’t share well, so I need to buy a second, but other than that it’s so much better made than other comparatively priced feeders I’ve seen. No opinion on longevity yet as I’m only using these for trips so far.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Makes feeding so much easier!!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this pet feeder about a month and I am loving this auto pet feeder! It works great. I did have to put it in between 2 things to keep my cat from knocking it over. I think my cat must be overzealous because it isn't light when its filled with food so not sure how he's knocking it over. I was worried when it was tipped that food wasn't dispensing. We went on a trip and my cat eats twice a day which is a lot to ask someone to come over - it was nice to have this and pet sitter could stop by less often to make sure he was good.
customer_reviews.author: Lora B.

customer_reviews.title: Mostly awesome with some tiny faults
customer_reviews.text: I like it a lot! Feeds my cat on time and holds almost 2 weeks of food when full but I have a couple complaints: 1. the serving sizes could be on a smaller scale - my cat needs 5 1/2 servings a day and I have to either give him a tiny scoop by hand every morning or up the portions so he's eating a little too much 2. the lock doesn't always work and my cat can shake it to get some food to fall out 3. the internal battery does not keep the time set if it gets unplugged (even for just a couple seconds)
customer_reviews.author: Wham

customer_reviews.title: Clock no longer works - unreliable
customer_reviews.text: We loved this initially, since our cat is food sensitive and will overeat if there is too much food given. Being able to have multiple small feedings per day have kept our cat healthy. However, after only having this feeder for a few months the digital clock has begun to loose time. We've tried fresh batteries, using the AC plug, having both in at the same time and nothing helps. This product has become useless as it no longer dispenses food as intended. Our pet would starve if we relied on the feeder at this point.
customer_reviews.author: Mindy

customer_reviews.title: Cat stopped begging!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased almost a year ago after reading all the reviews of all the models and finally picked this one. It's dependable - never misses a feeding, and not so fancy that there's much to go wrong. Not too loud, nice enough looking, not too bulky, overall it works well, looks fine, and the cat stopped begging and waking us up early - which is a miracle. There's a ton of different types of automatic feeders out there and we are glad we picked this one.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these. One for each dog. I am highly satisfied with these. Load then up and walk away. So the dogs spaz out when they hear me call their names and hear the food drop, which is very amusing and don't have the worry if I want to sleep in a little or if who in the household fed them. I have one dog that likes to be fat. This is a great device.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna R. Moss

customer_reviews.title: I like it! ... Update 6/8/19 error codes?
customer_reviews.text: Pretty easy to set up, would be nice if it came with batteries so you don't have to set it if you need it moved again but the schedule options are great and the feed amounts seem consistent. Update 6/8/19 Getting all E's on the screen.. (EE:EE) and feeds now inconsistent if they happen at all. My poor pets are starving by the time I get home and they tell me about it! Dropping to two stars until I find out a fix or hear from the seller/supplier.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Good, works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. I am currently portion feeding the cat because she gets sick from eating to fast. This feeder allows you to program 4 meals that will dispense at the given time. You can choose the portion size specific for each meal all the way down to a single tablespoon. The only thing I wish it did was allow for more meals. Ideally I need to feed my cat 6 times a day rather than 4. It would be great if there was a feature that allowed for an interval to be set with one portion size. That would be more useful to me at least since I currently give my cat the same portion size for each meal.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Hasha

customer_reviews.title: Great Pet Food Dispenser
customer_reviews.text: I made this purchase for my three ferrets as I will be going away for 4 days this coming weekend. I really do find it fascinating that you can set meal schedules and it will pour certain amount of food at that time! What a convenience! I should've gotten this machine a long time ago for my previous road trips. However, I would give it 4 stars because it said on the owner's manual that it would provide me with three D size alkaline batteries but it didn't. So far it works great! I just received it yesterday within two business days. I haven't tried the recording yet. I will test it out soon.
customer_reviews.author: George Chen

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Worked fine for a couple months and then it stopped. You can here the mechanical parts moving but nothing comes out. I've removed the food to see if that helped but no success. The programming can also be a little confusing. You'll need to keep that programming paper in cause you need to reset as the food portions are specific to a number. Seems like a good product in theory but if I'm traveling and no one's home I can't trust this dispenser to be reliable enough to dispense actual food.
customer_reviews.author: Del Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: Cat can bust in
customer_reviews.text: I really love this product, I had another feeder that was round moved sideways and could only accommodate a few meals, you can program 4 feeds a day and it will hold a half bag of food. The trouble is the locking mechanism broke quickly, it just jammed and won't lock and the cat can bust in, so I've had to tape down the sides, which is irritating when I got to refill. My only complaint. It looks nice and doesn't make a big ruckus when it drops the food.
customer_reviews.author: Michaela Renee @UsJohnsons

customer_reviews.title: As promised, works great so far.
customer_reviews.text: This was relatively easy to setup. I had a bit of confusion at first because I didn't realize there was a power switch on the bottom back of the unit and the manual wasn't super clear. However, it was easy to program and has worked well. It's probably ideal for dogs since the portions are a little big. Our goals were to get our cat on a more spread out feeding schedule to help with eating too fast, and make vacations and day trips easier on pet sitters. Love that it also takes batteries incase the power goes out while we're gone. It took her a little getting used to but she's taken to it. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: KOM

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Love this! My cat needs her food portioned or she’ll over eat and throw up. Our only complaint is the awkward portion sizes, but we made due. We currently have it set to dispense 3 times per day. Love that it runs on electricity but has a battery back up so it doesn’t lose the settings when the power goes out. Great if you need to go out of town!
customer_reviews.author: Brooke E.

customer_reviews.title: Still working well after 2 years!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this feeder for a little over 2 years now, and it's still working well. No jamming, my cat still hasn't figured out a way to open the top or get extra food out from the bottom, and I enjoy only having to refill the reservoir every week and a half. I've been very satisfied with this purchase, and recommend it (at least for cats, and probably small dogs...I feel like bigger dogs could probably chew it and break it more easily).
customer_reviews.author: A. Holmes

customer_reviews.title: Best investment for busy pet owners
customer_reviews.text: This is the best purchase I have made for my cats. I have 4 cats and have two pet feeders and it works great! It distributes the perfect amount of food for them twice a day every day. I was concerned that it might crap out and my cats would go hungry without me knowing but it hasn’t! I’ve had these for about a year and I travel a lot - this had made life so much easier. I don’t have to worry about someone to come by everyday to feed the cats.
customer_reviews.author: Arrianne Klier

customer_reviews.title: Stoped working in less than a month
customer_reviews.text: For the price I paid for this product I expect it to work consistently. Some days it dispenses food and some days it doesn’t even though I’ve set the schedule for meal times. If I bought an item to regularly dispense food for my dog then I don’t want to need to have to set the meal times every few days or so. Recently this product doesn’t even allow me to get into the settings to set the meal times. It just flashes and then stops instead of letting me change the settings. It works after I press it a few times, but the numbers for the meals don’t even stay “on” like before.
customer_reviews.author: YX Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for a few weeks now and my cat has not managed to get into it or knock it down or destroy it. I will rate it very high for that.. since he's a Houdini... so happy that I have something to use to feed him without him knocking it open/over. Still working on fine tuning the dispensing amount, I had it set one too high and I can see the weight gain on him, so I have reduced it. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Costello

product_meta.title: Arf Pets Automatic Pet Feeder Food Dispenser for Dogs, Cats & Small Animals – Features Distribution Alarms, Portion Control & Voice Recording – Timer Programmable Up to 4 Meals a Day
feature_bullets: Automatic Food Dispenser Makes Feeding Hassle Free for Pets’ Dietary Health & Wellbeing
Dispense from 1-10 Portions Per Meal, Each Portion is 24ml, Set Up to 4 Daily Distribution Alarms; Simply Pick Your Portion Size & Unit Dispenses Dry Meals
Blue Lightup LCD Clock & Display Provides Easily Adjustable Settings; Magnetic Lock Lid
Record Personal Meal Call Up to 10 Seconds; Runs on 3 D Batteries or DC Power Cable to Outlet
Customizable Feeder Great for Dogs, Cats and Small Animals of Various Sizes; Keep Them Happy All Day Long

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars2,143 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
